meanings.definition: Not resulting from or achieved through deliberate planning.
meanings.sent1: Her inadvertent mistake was easily fixed.
meanings.sent2: The inadvertent bump caused the glass to fall.
meanings.sent3: His inadvertent mix-up of names made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The inadvertent slip of the tongue revealed the secret.
meanings.sent5: The inadvertent error stood out among the flawless work.

meanings.sent1: The inadvertent meeting led to a new friendship.
meanings.sent2: She made an inadvertent comment that offended him.
meanings.sent3: The inadvertent spill of coffee made a mess.
meanings.sent4: His inadvertent discovery changed the course of history.
meanings.sent5: The inadvertent slip on the ice startled everyone nearby.
